Cross-Sector Positioning

CoT sector positioning vs history.

As of 2025-11-04

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • As of 2025-11-04, no sector currently triggers broad macro flags for crowding, hedger pressure, or unwind risk. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • Metals previously showed broad speculative crowding on 2025-10-28, with 55.6% of markets crowded long. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • This broad crowding in Metals has since eased, with only 22.22% of markets crowded long as of 2025-11-04. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]

Technical Summary:

  • Unwind risk across all sectors remains below the 30% threshold, with FX holding the highest at 23.08% on 2025-11-04. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • Metals' average speculative z-score shifted from 0.6125 (2025-10-28) to -0.3616 (2025-11-04), indicating reduced long stretch. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • No sector exhibits significant hedger pressure above the 40% threshold, suggesting limited defensive positioning. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]

References:

  • Cross_Sector_Positioning.html: latest report date 2025-11-04 00:00:00. This dataset directly informed all market and technical summaries. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • CFTC Commitments of Traders (CoT) Disaggregated data.
  • Global commodity futures and FX spot prices for market implied flow.

Self-healing:

  • **High-Value Inputs to Add:** Provide historical time series for `broad_unwind_risk` per sector to contextualize current levels. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • **High-Value Inputs to Add:** Include individual market-level `Flow_4w` data as input to `Cross_Sector_Positioning.html` for granular unwind risk assessment. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • **Weaknesses in Provided Inputs:** The `Cross_Sector_Positioning` table currently lacks an `avg_flow_4w` aggregated metric; add this to show sector-wide flow dynamics. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • **Weaknesses in Provided Inputs:** Standardize `Report_Date` format in the `Cross_Sector_Positioning` table to `YYYY-MM-DD` for daily reporting consistency. [Source: Cross_Sector_Positioning.html]
  • **Prompt Gaps or Issues:** The prompt instructed to identify "RSS Documents Needed" but provided no RSS feed, making this requirement unfulfillable.
